#!/static/bin/ash
#lesslinux provides xsetroot #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/bin:/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin export PATH skipflash=0
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
case $1 in start) mkdir -p ${HOME}/.lesslinux xsetroot -solid gray && touch ${HOME}/.lesslinux/xsetroot_successful ;; esac
